definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: thrust, impel (prob. orig. strike, hit, v. deriv., and Ph. [[פעם]] foot);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. sf. [[לְפַעֲמוֹ]] Ju Jdg 13:25 the spirit of ´[[י]] began to impel him.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be distrurbed, Pf. 1 s. [[נִפְעַמְתִּי]] Ps 77:5; Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּפָּ֫עֶם רוּחוֹ]] Ge 41:8, Da 2:3; so
